org.linqs.psl.database.rdbms

Class RDBMSDataStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.linqs.psl.database.rdbms.RDBMSDataStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataStore

    public class RDBMSDataStore
extends Object
implements DataStore
    The RDMBSDataStore is an RDBMS implementation of the DataStore interface. It will connect to any RDBMS that has a supporting DatabaseDriver implementation, and through the ConfigBundle can use custom names for its value, confidence, and partition columns.

    The ConfigBundle can also specify whether or not this RDBMSDatabase should use RDBMSUniqueStringID for its UniqueID implementation (as opposed to using RDBMSUniqueIntID).

    Author:
    Eric Norris

      • registerPredicate

        public void registerPredicate(StandardPredicate predicate)
        Description copied from interface: DataStore
        Registers a StandardPredicate so that GroundAtoms of that StandardPredicate can be persisted in this DataStore.

        If GroundAtoms of a StandardPredicate were already persisted in this DataStore at initialization, that StandardPredicate is already registered.

        Specified by:
        registerPredicate in interface DataStore
        Parameters:
        predicate - the predicate to register

      • getDatabase

        public Database getDatabase(Partition write,
                            Set<StandardPredicate> toClose,
                            Partition... read)
        Description copied from interface: DataStore
        Creates a Database that can read from and write to a Partition and optionally read from additional Partitions.

        Additionally, defines a set of StandardPredicates as closed in the Database, meaning that all GroundAtoms of that Predicate are ObservedAtoms.

        Specified by:
        getDatabase in interface DataStore
        Parameters:
        write - the Partition to write to and read from
        toClose - set of StandardPredicates to close
        read - additional Partitions to read from
        Returns:
        a new Database backed by this DataStore

      • getUniqueID

        public UniqueID getUniqueID(Object key)
        Description copied from interface: DataStore
        Returns a UniqueID based on the given key.

        An Integer must always be a valid key. Other types may be supported by implementations and/or configurations.

        If two keys are equal, they must map to the same UniqueID.

        Specified by:
        getUniqueID in interface DataStore
        Parameters:
        key - the key to a UniqueID
        Returns:
        the UniqueID indicated by key

      • getRegisteredPredicates

        public Set<StandardPredicate> getRegisteredPredicates()
        Description copied from interface: DataStore
        Returns the set of StandardPredicates registered with this DataStore. Note that the result can differ from calling Database.getRegisteredPredicates() on an associated Database, since additional predicates might have been registered since that Database was created.
        Specified by:
        getRegisteredPredicates in interface DataStore
        Returns:
        the set of StandardPredicates registered with this DataStore

        public static final String getSimilarityFunctionID(ExternalFunction extFun)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the String ID for this database

                                                          String functionID,
                                                          String... args)
        Used by the RDBMS to make an external function call.
        Parameters:
        databaseID - the ID for the RDBMSDatabase associated with this function call
        functionID - the ID of the ExternalFunction to execute
        args - the arguments for the ExternalFunction
        Returns:
        the result from the ExternalFunction

      • getNewPartition

        public Partition getNewPartition()
        Description copied from interface: DataStore
        Requests a new Partition that is assigned an auto-generated name and the next unused ID. This partition will remain in the datastore metadata unless explicitly deleted.
        Specified by:
        getNewPartition in interface DataStore
        Returns:
        new, unused partition

        public Partition getPartition(String partitionName)
        Description copied from interface: DataStore
        Gets a new Partition of the DataStore with the given name. If the partition doesn't exist, a new one will be created and added to the DataStore metadata.
        Specified by:
        getPartition in interface DataStore
        Parameters:
        partitionName - a human-readable name for the partition

        Specified by:

        Returns:
